name: Winn-Dixie Stores, Inc.
description: Winn-Dixie Stores, Inc. is a prominent supermarket chain based in the southeastern United States, known for providing quality groceries and a wide range of products to its customers. Founded in 1925, Winn-Dixie has a rich history and has become a staple in many communities, offering fresh produce, meat, bakery items, and household essentials. The company operates under a customer-centric philosophy, emphasizing value, quality, and service. With a commitment to community engagement, Winn-Dixie actively participates in local events and initiatives, supporting various charitable organizations and programs. The chain continues to innovate, enhancing the shopping experience through online ordering and delivery services, while also focusing on sustainability through waste reduction and environmentally friendly practices. As part of the Southeastern Grocers family, Winn-Dixie aims to be the preferred grocery store for its customers, providing a convenient and enjoyable shopping experience. The company's mission is to nourish families and enrich lives, making it a beloved choice for grocery shopping across its operational regions.

seo.meta_title: Winn-Dixie Stores, Inc. | Your Neighborhood Grocery Store
seo.meta_description: Winn-Dixie Stores, Inc. offers quality groceries and exceptional service in the southeastern U.S. Discover fresh produce, bakery items, and more at your local Winn-Dixie.

faq.question: What is Winn-Dixie known for?
faq.answer: Winn-Dixie is known for providing quality groceries and a wide range of products at competitive prices.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Winn-Dixie?
faq.answer: Anthony Hucker is the CEO of Winn-Dixie Stores, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Winn-Dixie headquartered?
faq.answer: Winn-Dixie is headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What are the main product categories at Winn-Dixie?
faq.answer: Winn-Dixie's main product categories include grocery items, health and beauty products, and household essentials.
